casebody.data:
ECKARD
v.
SMITH, et al. No. 573A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2005. Wesley E. Starnes, David S. Lackey, Lenoir, for Eunice Eckard. Wayne P. Huckel, Charlotte, for McCollum, Wallace, Redmond, Hartford Ins. & Iredell County.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of April 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (McCollum, et al.) shall have up to and Including the 6th day of June 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of April 2005."
